body:
I was more thinking about an OS-independent place. *golang.org/x/sys/windows* seems to be more about direct 1-to-1 mappings to the Windows API. Interestingly, the Windows API has a [PathCanonicalize function](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/bb773569(v=vs.85).aspx), but that [does not do the right thing](http://stackoverflow.com/a/684787/1127485).

Basically, I'm suggesting something like Java's [getCanonicalPath](https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/io/File.html#getCanonicalPath()), implemented for all OSes.
